mapper.insert: insert into temp_ua_user_new (id, name, email, phone, password, password_salt, last_login_time, last_login_ip, fail_count, status, group_id, group_role, create_date, last_update, password_date, trStatus) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passwordSalt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{failCount,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{groupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{groupRole,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{passwordDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{trstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select * from temp_ua_user_new where trStatus=0 and status=0
select * from temp_ua_user_new where id>=#{startNum,jdbcType=BIGINT} and id <#{endNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.update: update temp_ua_user_new set trStatus=1 where id =#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
